sources.full: Mythical Odysseys of Theros Dryad race

race.name: Dryad
race.source: Dryad race Mythical Odysseys of Theros

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Your Intellgence score increases by 1, and your wisdom score increases by 2.

entries.name: Age
entries: Dryad's can live up to 2000 years so long as their Kardia is not damaged and they are able to fulfill their natural cycle of life well. They tend to mature very very very slowly, just like how they grow very very very slowly. Dryad's live in their sproutling (baby) phase for about 2 years, once they hit 300 years their maturity is about the same as a young 20 year old human, as they age into their 2000's they are so old at this point that it simply cannot be comprehended they move slowly and speak such old versions of languages that most people do not know what they are saying. It is known however that if you can learn to understand them they are extremely wise and have sage advice as they have had a lot longer then many creatures to dwell upon this plane.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Dryad's being created under Nylea goddes of the hunt and the wilds, tend to be varied in their tendencies towards good and evil and can easily end up on either side of the coin depending on their past.

entries.name: Size
entries: Dryad's are just as varied as the species of plant from which they grow. Some Dryads are small at 4 foot and slender like their flowers, or small and stout, while some are 7 ft. tall and sturdy like the tree from which they have been tethered to. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: speed
entries: Your base walking speed is 30 feet

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Drudaeic the language of the plants

entries.name: Resistance
entries: You are resistant to radiant damage.

entries.name: Subraces
entries: Fire tree, Olive tree, Lotus Tree, poppy flower, Acanthus flower.

entries.name: Fear the flame
entries: Due to you being a plant and all, you are extremely aware of fire and tend to keep your distance, especially around community campfires with all their flying embers. No one can forget what happened to Vermillia the one time she got to close, Yikes! You don't fear fire though, you just respectfully give it the space it deserves.

entries.name: Forests Ichor
entries: Dyrads were created from the divine desires of Nylea Goddess of the hunt to be able to speak to the trees, glean their wisdom, and aide them in protection against the ever expanding empires. Just like how if mortals wish enough for the gods to make something come about, the gods can bring their own desires to fruition with enough work in their mystical arts. She reached her hand over the borders of the mortal plane and into the void of Nyx and plucked her dream from the skies casting it into the mortal plane. However their ability to walk was granted to them by Xenagos the planeswalker satyr who accomplished becoming a god. He gifted unto them the ability to either carry a seed which would hold their soul, or to carry a piece of their tethered sprout, (reffered to as their Kardia) leaving them free to walk the world no longer trapped by their limitations. Dryads come in a variety of colors and shapes related to the species of their Kardia, and are able to appear in the form they most identify with. The most common Dryad species are the Fir tree, Olive Tree, Lotus flower, poppy flower, and Acanthus mollis flower.

entries.name: One sided trust
entries: People strongly trust Dryads because of their sweet and playful nature, but rarely do Dryads truly trust most other creatures. Many of their race tend to believe all beings have some kind of agenda. A common agenda is that people ask Dryads to help them grow their crops or plants only to cut down those plants at the end of the season. “It’s murder I tell ya!”.  Or they may believe that other mortals are just like the gods, fickle, and that they are only there for you until they’ve gotten what they have needed. However, even though Dryad’s don’t trust most other people they don’t let that mistrust breed resentment or anger because most of these people won’t live that much longer in comparison to the long life of a dryad anyways. And some Dryad’s have come to peace with this cultural view and let it lay to rest as their ventures outside of their grottos, meadows, and forests have put them in situations to prove otherwise that people are genuinely trustworthy

ability.name: Tail whip
entries: Because you're strong and your long tail is enforced by thick scales you are able to use it as a whip. reaches in a 30 ft. line (Dex save)

ability.note2: Okay classes: Bard, Druid, Sorcerer, Wizard
ability.name: Bane Spray
entries: You have the ability to puff or blow a 5 by 30 ft. cone of Necrotic mist (Dex save)

ability.note2: Okay classes: ranger, wizard, Monk, Druid, Bard, Arteficer
ability.name: Venom Strike
entries: You have the ability to lash out venom in a stream of terror. attacks in a line up to 30 ft. (Con save)

ability.name: Acid Surge
entries: You are able to gurgle out a fountain of acid in a cone 5 by 30 ft. line (Dex save)

ability.name: Acid Surge
entries: You are able to gurgle out a fountain of acid in a cone 5 by 30 ft. line (Dex save)
